item.title: Can Chasing Small Customers Lead to Big Profits?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Mr. Robbins, a former full-time musician who still plays in a band, was nostalgic for the multicolor tour shirts of his youth, which he described as works of art. He said he was appalled by the one-color shirts sold at todays shows. He was also disappointed by the quality of shirts created by some of Austins many screen printers and said he could do better."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Darren Robbins and a partner founded Big D Custom Screen Printing in 2007. In its first year, the company, which is based in Austin, Tex., and specializes in printing T-shirts, recorded sales of $325,000 and a small loss."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="THE CHALLENGE To become profitable, Big D must determine whether to cater to customers with large printing orders or small. With that goal, Mr. Robbins and his partner, who worked for Capitol Records, invested a total of $225,000 to open Big D. The division of labor was clear. I was a natural-born customer-service geek, and he was a natural-born salesman, said Mr. Robbins, who resolved to take care of the customers his partner brought in. We wanted to be one of the big boys."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Land%20accounts%20from%20major%20banks%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22At%20first%2C%20Mr.%20Robbins%20and%20his%20partner%20agreed%20on%20strategy.%20With%20their%20industry%20contacts%2C%20they%20said%20they%20believed%20they%20could%20land%20accounts%20from%20major%20bands.%20Focusing%20on%20high-volume%20orders%20made%20sense%20to%20them%20in%20part%20because%20Big%20D%E2%80%99s%20suppliers%20offered%20a%20price%20break%20on%20large%20quantity%20T-shirt%20orders.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Chasing%20down%20high-volume%20clients%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22But%20the%20partners%20did%20not%20realize%20that%20most%20bands%20were%20locked%20in%20to%20long-term%20contracts%20for%20their%20tour%20shirts.%20Given%20that%2C%20Mr.%20Robbins%20started%20to%20wonder%20about%20the%20strategy%20of%20chasing%20down%20high-volume%20clients%2C%20particularly%20when%20he%20had%20so%20many%20smaller%20prospects%20knocking%20on%20his%20door.%20%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Conduct%20office%20presentations%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22But%2C%20he%20said%2C%20his%20partner%20saw%20no%20point%20in%20accepting%20orders%20for%20one%20or%20two%20shirts.%20His%20partner%20continued%20to%20believe%20big%20orders%20were%20crucial%20to%20profitability%20and%20that%20he%20could%20best%20win%20those%20accounts%20by%20conducting%20in-office%20presentations%20for%20corporate%20prospects%20across%20the%20country.%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="After a year in business, Mr. Robbins threw an anniversary party in April 2008 to thank his employees for their dedication. His partner, however, opposed the modest celebration because its cost meant the difference between breaking even and showing a loss on Big Ds first-year sales. This disagreement highlighted the increasing tension between the partners growth philosophies."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Determined to accept smaller orders, Mr. Robbins bought out his partner around the time of the party. The split was amicable, Mr. Robbins said, with his former partner breaking even on the sale and returning to the music business. And then the economy crashed. Almost overnight, companies tightened their belts, Mr. Robbins said. (Credit: idynamics.com)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Mr. Robbins, a former full-time musician who still plays in a band, was nostalgic for the multicolor tour shirts of his youth, which he described as works of art.

item.title: Spending More on Ads To Overcome a Slump
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Robin and Chris Sorensen, brothers and former firefighters, opened their first Firehouse Subs restaurant in 1994. They emphasized their firefighter heritage by featuring red furnishings, colorful murals of firefighters in action and sandwiches like the hook-and-ladder sub."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Firehouse Subs is a 16-year-old restaurant chain based in Jacksonville, Fla. It emphasizes a firefighter theme and has more than 390 restaurants that serve specialty submarine sandwiches."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="THE CHALLENGE Facing declining sales throughout its system, the chain sought a new marketing strategy in the depths of the recession. By 2001, the chain had grown to 30 company-owned restaurants in Florida and switched to a franchise model to expand into new markets. By early 2008, the company had expanded to 300 locations in 17 states, mostly in the South and Southeast. But then growth fizzled."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Advertising%20through%20chain%20stores%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22At%20first%2C%20Mr.%20Sorensen%20balked.%20But%20when%20the%20ad%20agency%20laid%20out%20data%20showing%20that%20some%20competing%20chains%20were%20spending%20more%20on%20advertising%20per%20store%2C%20he%20began%20to%20change%20his%20mind.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Alternative%20subway%20franchisees%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Subway%20franchisees%2C%20for%20example%2C%20pay%20an%208%20percent%20royalty%20and%20a%204.5%20percent%20advertising%20fee%3B%20Quiznos%20franchisees%20pay%20a%207%20percent%20royalty%20and%20a%204%20percent%20advertising%20fee%2C%20according%20to%20those%20companies.%20%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Creative%20campaign%20and%20radio%20ads%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Zimmerman%20developed%20a%20creative%20campaign%20and%20radio%20ads%20that%20emphasized%20the%20food%20and%20the%20portion%20sizes%2C%20but%20offered%20no%20discounts.%20The%20agency%20used%20the%20Sorensen%20brothers%20as%20spokesmen.%20%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="That March, comparative sales for the entire system declined from the previous March. In our entire history, we had never had a period like that when our entire system was running negative sales, said Don Fox, the chief executive. It was something completely foreign to us."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="The ad program ran only in markets where all franchisees agreed. Those who did not agree paid the 2 percent fee. With a new marketing war chest, Firehouse Subs and Zimmerman started an $8 million advertising campaign in September 2009. (Credit: nytimes.com)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Robin and Chris Sorensen, brothers and former firefighters, opened their first Firehouse Subs restaurant in 1994.

item.title: A Local Dry Cleaner Tries to Compete Against P.&G.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="FOUNDED in 2004, Hangers Cleaners of Kansas City, Mo., was started as an environmentally safe dry cleaner. It uses colorless, odorless liquid carbon dioxide instead of the aggressive chemicals applied at traditional dry cleaners. It has 35 employees and 2009 revenue of $1.6 million."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="To survive the arrival of a huge new competitor, Procter & Gamble, which began testing a Tide dry-cleaning service in Kansas City in 2008."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="When Joe Runyan started Hangers, he was hoping to bring a fresh approach to what he considered a stagnant industry. A first-time entrepreneur who had left a marketing career at Sprint, he had been dissatisfied with the local dry cleaners, finding dirty facilities and rude workers to be the norm."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Cultivate%20its%20offbeat%20image%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Hangers%20continued%20to%20cultivate%20its%20offbeat%20image.%20%E2%80%9CWe%20have%20a%20personality%20in%20a%20business%20devoid%20of%20it%2C%E2%80%9D%20Mr.%20Runyan%20said.%20%E2%80%9CWe%20can%E2%80%99t%20out-price%20or%20out-spend%20our%20big%20competitor%2C%20but%20we%20can%20be%20genuine%2C%20funny%20and%20edgy.%E2%80%9D%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Culture%20of%20service%20and%20accountability%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22He%20worked%20to%20create%20a%20tight-knit%20culture%20of%20service%20and%20accountability.%20If%20a%20garment%20was%20damaged%2C%20a%20store%20representative%20would%20call%20the%20customer%20immediately%20and%20offer%20to%20replace%20it.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Quantify%20the%20gained%20patrons%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22He%20initiated%20partnerships%20with%20corporations%2C%20nonprofit%20organizations%20and%20community%20groups%2C%20and%20he%20can%20quantify%20the%20patrons%20gained%20from%20each.%20He%20also%20contacted%20schools%20and%20donates%2010%20percent%20of%20the%20proceeds%20from%20parents%E2%80%99%20dry%20cleaning%20back%20to%20each%20school.%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Then, while researching the business, he discovered that the chemicals used by most cleaners were prohibiting new entrants. Building owners refused to lease space to cleaners using perchloroethylene, or perc, which is now heavily regulated. By no means was I a tree hugger, Mr. Runyan said. But from a business perspective, it was clear this industry had to change."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="While other local dry cleaners have told him that their year-over-year revenue is flat or down as much as 25 percent, Mr. Runyan said his revenue grew 2 to 3 percent in 2009 and his profits quadrupled, largely as a result of closing the unprofitable location. (Cedit: nytimes.com)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Founded in 2004, Hangers Cleaners of Kansas City, Mo., was started as an environmentally safe dry cleaner. Then a problem arose and here's how the owner dealt with it.

item.title: Background Checks for Job Candidates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="OfficeDrop scans paper documents into digital files. Its clients include hospitals that want to archive patient records and a minister with too many hand-written sermons. Prasad Thammineni started the company in 2007 and opened his doors to clients a year later."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Checking the backgrounds of job candidates to ensure that only trustworthy employees handle client documents (without violating candidate privacy or breaking the bank)."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="The need to do background checks came up in the start-up phase, when participants in a focus group said they were nervous about entrusting strangers with private documents. "][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Candidate%20identity%20information%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22The%20first%20piece%20of%20the%20package%20is%20the%20Social%20Security%20number%20and%20address%20check%2C%20which%20confirms%20the%20candidate%E2%80%99s%20name%20and%20date%20of%20birth%20and%20also%20shows%20where%20he%20or%20she%20has%20lived.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Criminal%20record%20check%20%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22The%20criminal%20checks%20can%20get%20complicated%20because%20authorities%20keep%20records%20in%20a%20wide%20range%20of%20courts.%20Kroll%20suggested%20that%20Mr.%20Thammineni%20pull%20data%20from%20three%20sources.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Court%20record%20information%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Kroll%20also%20recommended%20digging%20into%20federal%20court%20records%20that%20contain%20information%20about%20crimes%20committed%20across%20state%20lines%20and%20tried%20by%20federal%20courts%20for%20other%20reasons.%20%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Driving records came last. This check is crucial because employers can be liable for accidents that happen on company time. In addition, Ms. DeLoach said, the data can offer insights, flagging those who flout the law or abuse drugs or alcohol."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="OfficeDrop now pays $100 to $175 for every candidate, depending on how many states he or she has lived in. When Mr. Thammineni wants to hire a new employee, he enters the persons name and Social Security number in OfficeDrops online Kroll account; in less than a week, he receives a seven- or eight-page report. (Credit: nytimes.com)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: OfficeDrop scans paper documents into digital files. Its clients include hospitals that want to archive patient records and a minister with too many hand-written sermons.

item.title: Putting People Before Profits: Classic PR Case Study
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="In late 1995, a fire at Malden Mills put 3,000 union jobs at risk. The timing couldnt have been worse. The 90-year-old manufacturer in Lawrence, Mass., has seen its revenues triple and employment double since emerging from bankruptcy in 1982. Its popular Polartec and Polarfleece fabrics were one reason. A loyal and productive workforce was the other."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="In a time when offshore manufacturing became standard procedure in American business, Malden Mills CEO Aaron Feuerstein opted to stay put and to rebuild his factory on the very site where his family had made textiles for 90 years."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="The fire came just two weeks before Christmas, affecting employees both financially and emotionally. So just 2 days after the blaze, Feuerstein announced plans to pay his employees their full wages for 30 days. He would eventually extend that offer to 90 days for the paychecks, 180 days for benefits. Total cost to Malden Mills: $25 million."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22A%20business%20fairy%20tale%3F%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22It%20would%20seem%20so.%20Unfortunately%2C%20the%20case%20doesn%E2%80%99t%20end%20here.%20Feuerstein%20found%20himself%20back%20in%20bankruptcy%20court%2C%20saddled%20with%20%24140%20million%20in%20debt%2C%20much%20of%20it%20tied%20to%20the%20rebuild.%20The%20company%20hired%20a%20new%20president%20in%202004%20as%20part%20of%20the%20Chapter%2011%20reorganization.%20It%20wasn%E2%80%99t%20enough.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Did%20Aaron%20Fueurstein%20do%20the%20right%20thing%20in%201995%3F%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22After%20his%20decision%2C%20Feuerstein%20became%20a%20legend%20in%20both%20business%20and%20PR%20circles%20%E2%80%94%20a%20textbook%20case%20in%20excellence%20theory.%20But%20in%20the%20end%2C%20he%20leveraged%20the%20business%20into%20bankruptcy.%20No%20one%20will%20question%20Feuerstein%E2%80%99s%20good%20intentions%2C%20but%20there%E2%80%99s%20no%20line%20on%20the%20balance%20sheet%20for%20%E2%80%9Cloyalty%E2%80%9D%20or%20%E2%80%9Cethics.%E2%80%9D%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22The%20business%20of%20business%20is%20messy.%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Always%20has%20been.%20But%20we%20don%E2%80%99t%20often%20talk%20about%20the%20ugly%20side%20of%20it%20in%20our%20PR%20casebooks.%20Instead%2C%20we%20select%20cases%20that%20exemplify%20symmetrical%20communication%2C%20ethics%20and%20trust.%20And%20we%20celebrate%20them.%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="When students leave my classroom, few will work for principled managers like Aaron Feuerstein, the man they called the Mensch of Malden Mills. If theres a silver lining to this story, its that Polartec remains a great product with a loyal customer base, including me. None of that may have occurred had Feuerstein not saved the day on Dec. 13, 1995."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Sadly, Malden Mills didnt turn out as such a classic case in employee relations. To me, its a depressing reality of business world that makes maximizing shareholder value its top priority. (Credit: toughsledding.wordpress.com)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The 90-year-old manufacturer in Lawrence, Mass., has seen its revenues triple and employment double since emerging from bankruptcy in 1982.

item.title: How Social Media Drives New Business: Six Case Studies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Businesses both big and small are flocking to social media platforms such as Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and Foursquare. The fact is that a presence on these platforms not only allows companies to engage in conversations with consumers, but also serves as an outlet to drive sales through deals and coupons."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="And while major brands like Starbucks, Virgin, and Levis have been participating in the social web for some time now, the rate of adoption among small businesses is increasing too. According to a recent University of Maryland study, social media adoption by small businesses has doubled from 12% to 24% in the last year."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="But as these businesses look to Facebook and Twitter to connect with customers, many are finding that some strategies work and some do not produce results. Well be exploring these questions at a panel on Social Media and Businesses at our Social Currency CrunchUp on July 30. Weve found some local and national businesses using social media effectively, ranging from Levis to a creme brulee cart, whose case studies are below. Some of these businesses will be sharing their experiences at the CrunchUp."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Marketing%20strategy%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22The%20company%E2%80%99s%20marketing%20VP%20Ann%20Nadeau%20tells%20me%20that%20because%20of%20the%20economy%20the%20hotel%20industry%E2%80%99s%20marketing%20budgets%20have%20shrunk%2C%20and%20social%20media%20efforts%20have%20proved%20to%20be%20a%20great%20way%20to%20both%20drive%20sales%20and%20build%20loyalty.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Social%20Media%20Utilization%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22The%20company%E2%80%99s%20social%20media%20efforts%20are%20not%20solely%20deal%20based.%20This%20summer%2C%20Joie%20De%20Vivre%20encouraged%20consumers%20to%20enter%20its%20Road%20Trippin%E2%80%99%20California%20contest%2C%20which%20asked%20people%20to%20submit%20videos%20on%20YouTube%20that%20share%20why%20they%20love%20California.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Customer%20Service%20Support%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22In%20terms%20of%20using%20social%20media%20for%20customer%20service%2C%20Nadeau%20says%20that%20each%20property%20hotel%20manager%20is%20responsible%20for%20monitoring%20conversations%20and%20reviews%20on%20Twitter%2C%20Facebook%2C%20and%20Yelp.%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Food from street carts have become a foodie favorite for San Franciscans. Food carts travel from neighborhood to neighborhood, offering their delicacies to a range of local foodies. But without a set location, how do these carts let consumers know where they will be? Well, through Twitter of course."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Curtis Kimball, the man behind the enormously popular Creme Brulee Cart in San Francisco, has quickly amassed over 12,000 followers in a little over a year. (Credit: techcrunch.com)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Businesses both big and small are flocking to social media platforms such as Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and Foursquare.

item.title: An Effective but Risky Strategy for Late-Paying Clients
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="I still did not receive my payment for month-old work. Im kind of hesitant to speed up work on your project because I have several projects in progress and my priorities are shifted towards the paid ones. So a web developer emailed me the other day. By the way, we (my business partner and I in a web development venture) like her a lot: She is fast, professional, has reasonable rates, and does high-quality work."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Her email was in response to my asking her to give us a sense of when we can expect more project deliverables, as well as to ask if she could devote more time to our project."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Her reply was a bit of a shock to us. We had paid her up front when we began work, and since put two checks in the mail. Apparently she had not received these two checks, which did not make sense. Also, while we knew she was awaiting payment, she never told us that she was on the brink of slowing down work on the project."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Grab%20the%20audience's%20attention%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22It%20got%20our%20attention.%20We%20scrambled%20to%20get%20her%20on%20the%20phone%20and%20resolve%20the%20problem.%20It%20used%20her%20leverage%20over%20us%20%E2%80%94%20our%20need%20to%20get%20work%20done.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Use%20the%20right%20strategy%20to%20call%20for%20action%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22%20We%20needed%20the%20project%20done%2C%20and%20so%20had%20some%20conversations%20about%20how%20to%20phase%20her%20out%20quickly%20(after%20all%2C%20we%20thought%20the%20check%20was%20in%20the%20mail).%20Her%20move%20could%20have%20cost%20her%20a%20lot%20of%20work.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Solve%20the%20issue%20in%20an%20appropriate%20way%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22She%20should%20have%20sent%20a%20warning%20first%2C%20so%20that%20we%20could%20have%20resolved%20the%20situation%20without%20taking%20it%20to%20the%20brink.%20After%20all%2C%20honest%20mistakes%20on%20both%20of%20our%20parts%20led%20to%20this%20problem.%20%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="The above strategy got our attention, because we really wanted to accelerate progress on our project and, so far, she was our main resource (and design/usability is the bottleneck on this project). At the same time, it got us frustrated, too, because it came as a surprise given that we thought the checks were in the mail."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="So, we called her immediately to find out how we could resolve the situation. When we did, we learned that she had moved her office without our knowledge, and so her checks were most likely being forwarded. After our talk, she did accelerate her work, and in fact exceeded our expectations (Credit: sitepoint.com)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The above strategy got our attention, because we really wanted to accelerate progress on our project and, so far, she was our main resource (and design/usability is the bottleneck on this project).

item.title: Carbon Emission Management Assistant
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="The University of Cambridges Environment and Energy section works to improve the environmental sustainability of the Universitys operational estate. With an estate portfolio valued at over 1.7bn, a planned capital building programme worth 412m, and energy costs of 15m a year, the University has a high environmental impact and large carbon footprint. We are committed to an absolute reduction of our carbon footprint by 2020."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="My graduate placement, as Carbon Management Assistant was created to help support the Carbon Reduction Manager in a number of areas of carbon management."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="I supported the Carbon Reduction Manager in a number of areas including data management, analysis and reporting; project design and implementation; and communications and engagement. I also helped to implement the Energy and Carbon Reduction Project (ECRP)."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Improve%20carbon%20savings%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22I%20helped%20to%20organise%20the%20launch%20of%20the%20University%E2%80%99s%20Equipment%20Replacement%20Programme%2C%20which%20should%20see%20large%20carbon%20savings%20with%20funding%20to%20replace%20inefficient%20pieces%20of%20energy%20intensive%20equipment%2C%20such%20as%20-80%20freezers%2C%20in%20the%20near%20future.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Carbon%20emission%20review%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22I%20also%20helped%20on%20a%20practical%20level%20with%20the%20current%20review%20of%20the%20University%E2%80%99s%20Carbon%20Management%20Plan.%20I%20carried%20out%2C%20reviewed%20and%20improved%20the%20University%E2%80%99s%20methods%20for%20reporting%20Scope%203%20(indirect)%20carbon%20emissions%20helping%20to%20report%20against%20targets%20in%20the%20future.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Results%20Analyses%20%26%20Conclusions%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22My%20placement%20was%20organised%20through%20Change%20Agents%2C%20who%20supported%20the%20University%20in%20terms%20of%20helping%20with%20the%20recruitment%20process%20and%20provided%20me%20with%20personal%20and%20professional%20development%20as%20a%20graduate.%20%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Opportunity Benefits: I was given the opportunity to attend many events as well to develop skills and knowledge outside of the scope of the role. I was given the independence to focus and work on different areas, and to make contacts which will be extremely useful for my future career and studies."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="During my opportunity, I launched and started the beginnings of the Universitys Green Labs Programme a programme which seeks to reduce the environmental impact of scientific research where possible. (Credit: environment.admin.cam.ac.uk)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The University of Cambridges Environment and Energy section works to improve the environmental sustainability of the Universitys operational estate.

item.title: Tylenol Scandal and Crisis Management
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="In October of 1982, Tylenol, the leading pain-killer medicine in the United States at the time, faced a tremendous crisis when seven people in Chicago were reported dead after taking extra-strength Tylenol capsules. It was reported that an unknown suspect/s put 65 milligrams of deadly cyanide into Tylenol capsules, 10,000 more than what is necessary to kill a human. The tampering occurred once the product reached the shelves. "][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="In 1982, Tylenol controlled 37 percent of its market with revenue of about $1.2 million. Immediately after the cyanide poisonings, its market share was reduced to seven percent (Mitchell 1989). They were removed from the shelves, infected with cyanide and returned to the shelves (Mitchell, 1989)."][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Once the connection was made between the Tylenol capsules and the reported deaths, public announcements were made warning people about the consumption of the product. Johnson & Johnson was faced with the dilemma of the best way to deal with the problem without destroying the reputation of the company and its most profitable product."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Offer%20favorable%20coupons%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22In%20order%20to%20motivate%20consumers%20to%20buy%20the%20product%2C%20they%20offered%20a%20%242.50%20off%20coupon%20on%20the%20purchase%20of%20their%20product.%20They%20were%20available%20in%20the%20newspapers%20as%20well%20as%20by%20calling%20a%20toll-free%20number.%20(Mitchell%201989)%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Recover%20from%20stock%20crisis%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22To%20recover%20loss%20stock%20from%20the%20crisis%2C%20Johnson%20%26%20Johnson%20made%20a%20new%20pricing%20program%20that%20gave%20consumers%20up%20to%2025%25%20off%20the%20purchase%20of%20the%20product.%20(Mitchell%201989)%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Restore%20the%20confidence%20on%20the%20product%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Over%202250%20sales%20people%20made%20presentations%20for%20the%20medical%20community%20to%20restore%20confidence%20on%20the%20product.%20(Mitchell%201989)%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Following one of our guidelines of protecting people first and property second, McNeil Consumer Products, a subsidiary of Johnson & Johnson, conducted an immediate product recall from the entire country which amounted to about 31 million bottles and a loss of more than $100 million dollars. (Lazare, Chicago Sun-Times 2002) Additionally, they halted all advertisement for the product."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Although Johnson & Johnson knew they were not responsible for the tampering of the product, they assumed responsibility by ensuring public safety first and recalled all of their capsules from the market. In fact, in February of 1986, when a woman was reported dead from cyanide poisoning in Tylenol capsules, Johnson & Johnson permanently removed all of the capsules from the market. (Credit: http://iml.jou.ufl.edu)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: In October of 1982, Tylenol in the United States faced a tremendous crisis when 7 people in Chicago were reported dead after taking extra-strength Tylenol capsules.

item.title: Maclaren's Stroller Recall: What Would You Do?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Safe to say the management team at Maclaren is having a terrible week. On Monday its US subsidiary issued a press release announcing a recall of every baby stroller it has sold in the United States in the past decade which means about one million units. The purpose is to install a cover for the strollers hinge mechanism, which is sharp enough to cut through a babys fingers should they happen to be in the wrong spot as the stroller is opened.* In fact, this has happened on at least twelve occasions."][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="If you didnt get a sick feeling in the pit of your stomach as you read that paragraph, you are not a consumer goods executive or a parent. Think about all the levels on which its your worst nightmare, beyond your obvious concern for the childrens injuries:"][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Maclaren surely knows it has much to lose from the publicity, but it did the right thing in the US. It contacted the Consumer Product Safety Commissions Office of Compliance and asked for its help in conducting a recall under the Fast Track Product Recall Program. That saved the CPSC from conducting a detailed evaluation of the product, and allowed the company to get out in front of the story as it hit the press."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Engage%20a%20reputable%2C%20independent%2C%20outside%20investigator%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Once%20the%20study%20is%20complete%2C%20make%20it%20available%20to%20the%20baby%20stroller%20industry%20at%20large%20so%20that%20all%20companies%20involved%20in%20the%20manufacture%20of%20strollers%20might%20benefit%20from%20it.%20%E2%80%93%20John%20R.%20Hall%2C%20retired%20chairman%2C%20Ashland%20Incorporated%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Hire%20a%20crisis%20management%20expert%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22charged%20with%20setting%20up%20and%20training%20a%20permanent%2C%20internal%20crisis-management%20team%20comprising%20people%20from%20the%20operations%2C%20marketing%2C%20IT%2C%20security%2C%20and%20legal%20departments.%20%E2%80%93%20Ian%20Mitroff%2C%20University%20of%20Southern%20California%20Marshall%20School%20of%20Business%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Announce%20the%20recall%20in%20paid%20advertisements%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22as%20well%20as%20issuing%20the%20joint%20press%20release%20with%20the%20CPSC.%20While%20the%20CPSC%20does%20not%20allow%20ads%20announcing%20a%20recall%20to%20be%20marketing%20tools%2C%20the%20agency%20would%20allow%20language%20expressing%20the%20company%E2%80%99s%20commitment%20to%20its%20customers.%20%E2%80%93%20Alan%20H.%20Schoem%2C%20former%20Director%20of%20the%20Office%20of%20Compliance%20at%20the%20U.S.%20Consumer%20Product%20Safety%20Commission%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="As for all the other fronts of the crisis noted above, we dont know what Maclarens management will do. But thanks to Harvard Business Reviews archives, we know what they should do. In 2001, HBR published a case study called When No News is Good News, and asked four experts to advise on the issues it raised. Its the fictional story of, you guessed it, a baby stroller manufacturer deciding what to do after a highly publicized accident involving one of its products. A few nuggets from those experts:"][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Crisis management, by definition, is not something a company thinks about often. But when a crisis hits, a company has to do a whole lot of things right. Lets hope Maclaren is doing them.
(Credit: hbr.org)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1"
