item.excerpt:encoded: Safe to say the management team at Maclaren is having a terrible week. On Monday its US subsidiary issued a press release announcing a recall of every baby stroller it has sold .

item.title: Yeswares Matthew Bellows on His Ironic Challenge
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Converting free users into paying customers. By early 2013, even with a newly hired 10-person sales team, Yeswares sales were abysmal and the company had yet to turn a profit, casting a pall over pending efforts to raise venture capital. Because he was struggling to sell a product built to make sales easier, Matthew Bellows, a co-founder, felt like the shoemaker whose own children pad about barefoot.
"][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="YESWARE is a four-year-old company that designs and sells software intended to make it easier for sales teams to record and analyze essential data. Released in late 2012, Yeswares basic version, which can be downloaded free, quickly attracted more than 100,000 users. "][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="But this kind of oversight requires salespeople to type updates into customer relations systems, rather like police detectives pecking away on case reports back at their desks. Sales agents hate doing it, and sales managers hate hectoring them."][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Clean%20house.%20Fire%20seven%20of%20the%2010%20salespeople.%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Step%20in%20himself%20as%20vice%20president%20of%20sales%20and%20devote%20the%20necessary%20time%20to%20training%20and%20supervision.%20To%20ensure%20he%20would%20have%20that%20time%2C%20he%20would%20hire%20a%20chief%20executive%20to%20serve%20in%20his%20stead.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Hire%20a%20vice%20president%20of%20sales.%20%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22Have%20this%20person%20do%20the%20firing%2C%20hiring%20and%20supervision%20while%20Mr.%20Bellows%20remained%20chief%20executive.%20Such%20a%20search%20might%20take%20as%20long%20as%20six%20months%2C%20and%20with%20the%20need%20to%20raise%20venture%20capital%20looming%2C%20Mr.%20Bellows%20wondered%20if%20he%20could%20wait%20that%20long.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Promote%20the%20best%20sales%20person%20among%20the%20three%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22He%20deemed%20worthy%20of%20keeping%20to%20manage%20the%20team.%20The%20person%20he%20had%20in%20mind%20had%20six%20years%20of%20sales%20experience.%20He%20had%20never%20led%20a%20sales%20team%20but%20had%20demonstrated%20an%20aptitude%20for%20mentoring%20and%20leadership.%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="In his previous company, with no investors and no need to raise money, business had been simpler. He could serve as chief executive and the lone sales rep. Any doubt that he was wearing too many hats at Yesware evaporated the day he discovered his entire sales team in a conference room at 2 p.m. on a Wednesday in June hanging out, listening to loud music and drinking beer, like it was a frat house."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Mr. Bellows closed the conference room door without a word. That weekend he went to a meditation center in Vermont to ponder how he might fix his sales team. (Credit: nytimes.com)"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: By early 2013, even with a newly hired 10-person sales team, Yeswares sales were abysmal and the company had yet to turn a profit, casting a pall over pending efforts to raise venture capital.

item.title: Ericsson's Proactive Supply Chain Risk Management
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Project Infomation" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="7/12" offset="vc_col-md-8"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="When faced with a supply chain disruption, proactive and reactive supply chain risk management can in fact make or break a companys existence. One of the most famous (or rather infamous) cases is the fire at the Philips microchip plant in Albuquerque, New Mexico, in 2000, which simultaneously affected both Nokia and Ericsson. However, both companies took a very different approach toward the incident, and in hindsight, clearly displayed how to and how not to handle supply chain disruptions.
"][tm_spacer size="lg:26"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="In the late 1990s, Swedish-owned Ericsson was one of the big international players in the mobile phone industry, together with the Finnish company Nokia. My first mobile phone in 1996 was in fact a Nokia, but I switched to Ericsson in 1999, because they made much better phones, so I thought. While the phones may have been better, risk management for sure wasnt.
"][tm_spacer size="xs:40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" lg_spacing="padding_left:70" md_spacing="padding_left:15" offset="vc_col-md-4"][tm_attribute_list attributes="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Client%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Insight%20Studio%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Date%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2220%20Feb%2C%202018%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Skills%20%3A%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Project%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_gallery image_size="570x385" gutter="30" row_gutter="30" images="246,247" columns="xs:1;sm:2;lg:2" image_rounded="5px"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:100"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Challenge & Solution" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Ericsson learned its lesson and now has a completely different supply chain risk management system in place. It starts with mapping all the components and products many tiers upstream the supply chain and identifies critical suppliers and sites that have to be prioritized and assessed further. After a rough assessment on how shortage will affect the supply chain, a more thorough investigation into probability and impact of different accidents at different suppliers is conducted to assess the impact on the supply chain as a whole, particularly the impact on business recovery time. "][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_list icon_type="ion" icon_ion="ion-flash" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20and%20operations%20and%20production%20planning%3A%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22I%20haven%E2%80%99t%20been%20able%20to%20find%20much%20research%20literature%20on%20Nokia%E2%80%99s%20supply%20chain%20risk%20management%2C%20maybe%20because%20it%20went%20so%20well%20for%20Nokia.%20Ericsson%2C%20on%20the%20other%20hand%2C%20is%20another%20story.%20The%20incident%20turned%20disaster%20cost%20the%20Swedish%20company%20%24400%20million%20in%20lost%20sales%2C%20and%20it%20had%20to%20quit%20the%20mobile-phone%20business%2C%20leaving%20Nokia%20to%20cement%20its%20position%20as%20the%20European%20market%20leader.%20What%20went%20wrong%3F%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22On%20March%2017%2C%202000%2C%20a%20small%20fire%20hit%20a%20microchip%20plant%20owned%20by%20Philips%2C%20the%20Dutch%20company.%20The%20plant%20supplied%20chips%20to%20both%20Ericsson%20and%20Nokia%2C%20and%20the%20smoke%20and%20water%20damage%20from%20the%20small%20and%20easily%20contained%20fire%20contaminated%20millions%20of%20chips%20%E2%80%94%20almost%20the%20plant%E2%80%99s%20entire%20stock.%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%2C%22item_desc%22%3A%22This%20article%20was%20written%20in%202004%2C%20when%20Nokia%20was%20still%20a%20major%20player%20in%20the%20mobile%20market.%20While%20Nokia%20may%20have%20learned%20a%20lesson%20in%20supply%20chain%20resilience%2C%20Nokia%20did%20not%20learn%20what%20it%20would%20have%20taken%20to%20stay%20a%20major%20player.%22%7D%5D" lg_spacing="padding_left:34" sm_spacing="padding_left:15"][tm_spacer size="sm:40;lg:80"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Our Process" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:30"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Finally, risk management actions (protection) are evaluated against risk costs (impact and consequences), to avoid over-action or over-insurance against incidents. Not only Ericsson, but many other companies have also learned from this incident. Supply chain risk management (SCRM) is a necessary component of any supply chain. SCRM may lead to increased costs in the form of prevention measures, and SCRM may lead to increased lead time, in order to have buffers, should something happen. In essence, though, risk exposure always has a price, and as a company, one should think through what price (or rather cost, as in disruption cost) that is."][tm_spacer size="lg:52"][tm_gradation items="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Determine%20the%20right%20inventory%20level%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Optimize%20the%20supply%20chain%20for%20perfect%20order%20planning%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Improve%20sales%20%26%20operations%20%26%20production%20planning%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:90;lg:130"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Result Driven" font_size="lg:30"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="In his 2006 article Robust strategies for mitigating supply chain disruptions, Christopher Tang uses Nokias approach as one of three prime examples of how to counter supply chain disruptions. Most recently Jon Hansen of Procurement Insights decided to reopen the case and ask industry experts to weigh in with their opinion as to what happened at Ericsson and why, and what they believe should take place to address the obvious shortfalls on a go forward basis.
(Credit: husdal.com )"][tm_spacer size="lg:24"][tm_list list_style="circle" columns="xs:1;lg:1" items="%5B%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Reduced%20lead%20time%20by%2043%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-snowflake-o%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert-circled%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-angle-double-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-smiling-baby%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Decreased%20variability%20by%2050%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Lowered%20the%20risk%20of%20back-order%20by%2095%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%2C%7B%22item_title%22%3A%22Increased%20stock%20for%20finished%20goods%20by%2010%25%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-adjust%22%2C%22icon_ion%22%3A%22ion-alert%22%2C%22icon_themify%22%3A%22ti-arrow-up%22%2C%22icon_flat%22%3A%22flaticon-heartbeat%22%7D%5D"][tm_spacer size="sm:50"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-md-6"][tm_line_chart datasets="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2001%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2215%3B%2010%3B%2022%3B%2019%3B%2023%3B%2017%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(105%2C59%2C255%2C0.55)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Item%2002%22%2C%22values%22%3A%2234%3B%2038%3B%2035%3B%2033%3B%2037%3B%2040%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22fill%22%3A%22custom%22%2C%22fill_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C110%2C253%2C0.56)%22%2C%22point_style%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_type%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22line_style%22%3A%22solid%22%2C%22thickness%22%3A%22thin%22%2C%22line_tension%22%3A%2210%22%7D%5D" legend_position="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: When faced with a supply chain disruption, proactive and reactive supply chain risk management can in fact make or break a companys existence.

item.title: Accordion & Toggle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row full_width="stretch_row" lg_spacing="border_bottom:1;padding_top:120;padding_bottom:120" sm_spacing="padding_top:100;padding_bottom:100"][vc_column][tm_heading custom_google_font="" align="center" text="Style 01" font_size="sm:24;md:30;lg:36"][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:80"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][tm_accordion multi_open="1" items="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Creativity%20%26%20Originality%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22The%20notion%20that%20a%20professional%20adviser%20is%20just%20like%20any%20other%20provider%20of%20a%20service%20to%20a%20dominant%20consumer%20has%20become%20more%20widespread.%20One%20reason%20for%20this%20is%20that%20professional%20advice%20has%20become%20more%20commoditized%2C%20as%20in%20the%20case%20of%20routine%20legal%20services%3B%20another%20reason%20is%20that%20some%20consumers%2Fclients%20themselves%20have%20their%20own%20way%20of%20thinking.%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Integrity%20and%20Reliability%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22Honesty%20and%20dependability%20aren't%20just%20about%20being%20faithful%2C%20though%20it's%20a%20wider%20category%20than%20that.%20For%20us%2C%20that%20means%20%5C%22being%20crystal%20clear%20about%20things%5C%22%20and%20clearing%20up%20your%20expectations%20in%20the%20beginning%2C%20so%20you're%20not%20leaving%20your%20customers%20hanging%20or%20promising%20something%20you%20can%20never%20give.%20%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Quality%20Assurance%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22We%20are%20committed%20to%20achieving%20the%20highest%20standards%20of%20quality%20in%20everything%20we%20do%2C%20including%20the%20creation%20of%20content%2C%20training%20methods%2C%20and%20tools.%20The%20result%20is%20simple%3A%20customer%20satisfaction%20worldwide.%20As%20a%20global%20training%20provider%2C%20our%20quality%20management%20approach%20is%20evident%20in%20our%3A%20Respect%20for%20our%20clients'%20requirements%20and%20keep%20our%20promises.%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Improvement%20Focusing%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22We%20believe%20that%2C%20no%20matter%20how%20advanced%20and%20capable%20our%20business%20and%20financial%20services%20may%20be%2C%20we%20can%20always%20make%20them%20better%20for%20you.%20Our%20goals%20are%20to%20give%20you%20the%20very%20best%20services%20that%20we%20can%20provide.%20As%20a%20business%20and%20financial%20consultant%2C%20our%20efforts%20to%20do%20so%20are%20limitless.%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner item.title: Dont Want a Robot to Replace You? Study Tolstoy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][tm_heading tag="h5" custom_google_font="" google_fonts="font_family:Poppins%3A300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700" font_weight="600" text="Now admittedly, you have to have technical chops to get hired at Google, but having those undervalued soft skills makes a difference the long run makes, and studying art and literature helps cultivate them. By contrast, studies suggest that studying economics reduces empathy." line_height="1.4"][tm_spacer size="lg:25"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Morton Schapiro, president of Northwestern University, is an economist. Gary Saul Morson, his colleague, does close readings of Tolstoy. Together they teach a course on what economists can learn from the humanities and have co-authored a book, Cents and Sensibility, on the same theme. "][tm_spacer size="lg:63"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/12"][tm_image image="875"][tm_spacer size="sm:30"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="9/12"][tm_heading tag="h5" custom_google_font="" font_weight="600" text="Use psychological pricing methods." line_height="1.4"][tm_spacer size="lg:23"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Morton Schapiro: Economists do a good job applying our theories and tools to subjects that are normally associated with other fields, such as the cycle of poverty, individual behavior, and so on. But theres evidence in citations and surveys that economists approach other fields in a more imperialistic way than they probably should. "][tm_spacer size="xs:30;lg:35"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Saul points out that theres an idea that other fields have the great questions and economists have the all the answers. Economics brings a lot to these other fields, but these other fields could bring a lot more to economics. One thats far-flung from what economists usually think of as a basis for useful knowledge is literature."][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][tm_spacer size="xs:30;lg:52"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Some things can only be explained by stories, like great novels. Ethical questions can be endlessly complex, which is a central theme of great authors like George Eliot. The realistic model of people you get in literature is a lot closer to what people really are like than what you often find in economics."][tm_spacer size="xs:30;lg:68"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_col-md-6"][tm_heading tag="h5" custom_google_font="" font_weight="600" text="Demonstrate the differences" line_height="1.4"][tm_spacer size="lg:23"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="By the very nature of needing to mathematicize their theories, economists cant account for some things. You cant mathematicize culture. A lot of theories covertly smuggle in certain cultural assumptions, like the notion that everybody is like an American. But everybody is not. What looks like an economic model turns out to be a cultural model, and cultures really do differ."][tm_spacer size="sm:30;lg:68"][tm_heading tag="h5" custom_google_font="" font_weight="600" text="Offer a money-back guarantee" line_height="1.4"][tm_spacer size="lg:23"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Literature is particularly important because you identify with people very much unlike yourself, from different cultures, genders, backgrounds. You learn to empathize and get out of the natural narrowness and egoism of thinking everybody is like yourself. "][tm_spacer size="sm:30;lg:68"][tm_heading tag="h5" custom_google_font="" font_weight="600" text="Test your offer and price, and be creative." line_height="1.4"][tm_spacer size="lg:23"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="You get constant practice at it. Theres no way to read Tolstoy without extending empathy on page after page with one character or another. You learn to turn your critical intelligence on your own favorite assumptions. Thats what higher education needs to include."][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_col-md-6"][tm_spacer size="sm:40"][tm_image full_wide="1" image="876"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: You get constant practice at it. Theres no way to read Tolstoy without extending empathy on page after page with one character or another.

custom_google_font="" text="Corporate" font_size="sm:24;md:30;lg:36"][tm_spacer size="lg:27"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="Businext Membership Club is our way of saying thank you to corporate bookers and agents who regularly choose our company for business consulting, financial projections, bond & stock counseling, online marketing, architecture design, etc."][tm_spacer size="lg:50"][tm_image image_size="custom" full_wide="1" image="644" image_size_width="770" image_size_height="350" rounded="5"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_accordion style="3" items="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Does%20my%20company%20get%20free%20admission%20to%20the%20member%20club%3F%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22The%20Businext%20Member%20Club%20has%20a%20robust%20Corporate%20Membership%20program%20that%20offers%20a%20wide%20range%20of%20benefits%3A%20The%20cornerstone%20is%20free%20employee%20access%20to%20both%20club%20and%20forum.%20Please%20check%20our%20roster%20to%20see%20if%20your%20company%20is%20eligible%20for%20becoming%20a%20member%20of%20ours.%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22How%20can%20my%20company%20get%20involved%20at%20the%20Businext%20Club%3F%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22Businext%20club%20inspires%20and%20engages%20the%20employees%20%26%20clients%20of%20nearly%20300%20of%20the%20most%20distinguished%20and%20innovative%20global%20businesses.%20Join%20today%20to%20enjoy%20exclusive%20events%2C%20one-of-a-kind%20experiences%2C%20and%20team-building%20activities%20that%20will%20spark%20creativity%20and%20new%20ideas.%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22What%20are%20the%20marketing%20opportunities%20for%20my%20company%3F%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22Program%20sponsorship%20with%20Businext%20Club%20offers%20significant%20philanthropic%20and%20marketing%20opportunities%20for%20corporate%20engagement%20through%20the%20Club%E2%80%99s%20customized%2C%20wide-ranging%20partnership%20platform.%20Programs%20available%20for%20sponsorship%20include%20educational%20activities%2C%20exhibitions%2C%20performances%2C%20film%20series%2C%20concerts%2C%20etc.%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22How%20do%20I%20host%20an%20event%20at%20the%20Businext%20Club%3F%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22At%20select%20levels%2C%20corporates%20have%20the%20exclusive%20opportunity%20to%20host%20an%20event%20at%20the%20Businext%20Club.%20(Additional%20rental%20fees%20do%20apply.)%20For%20more%20information%20about%20becoming%20a%20member%20of%20that%2C%20please%20visit%20our%20Corporate%20Membership%20page%20or%20call%20(012)%20345-6789.%20%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][tm_spacer size="sm:50;lg:90"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="Partners" font_size="sm:24;md:30;lg:36"][tm_spacer size="lg:27"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="On the road to success of Businext, the role of our partners are of the great importance. We take partnerships seriously, therefore there are so many benefits and privileges to be brought about through cooperation and union between sides."][tm_spacer size="lg:50"][tm_image image_size="custom" full_wide="1" image="4075" image_size_width="770" image_size_height="350" rounded="5"][tm_spacer size="lg:40"][tm_accordion style="3" items="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22How%20do%20my%20company%20host%20an%20event%3F%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22We%20have%20elegant%20spaces%20and%20convenient%20location%20with%20expansive%20office%20buildings%20in%20Long%20Island%20City%20for%20our%20partner.%20We%20also%20provide%20facilities%20for%20events%20of%20both%20large%20and%20small%20size%20to%20be%20taken%20place.%5Cn%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Can%20my%20company%20plan%20and%20host%20an%20exhibition%20at%20your%20place%3F%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22Definitely%20yes.%20That%20is%20one%20among%20various%20privileges%20of%20becoming%20a%20partner%20with%20us.%20We%20do%20not%20accept%20exhibition%20proposals%20from%20outside%20organizations%20or%20allow%20companies%20to%20host%20public%20displays%20at%20our%20place.%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Can%20we%20host%20a%20product%20launch%20party%3F%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22This%20depends%20on%20the%20kind%20of%20products%20you%20would%20like%20to%20introduce.%20Please%20review%20the%20guidelines%20on%20our%20website%20for%20more%20information%20about%20types%20of%20products%20allowed%20to%20be%20promoted.%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22How%20do%20we%20get%20our%20products%20in%20your%20collection%3F%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22Only%20products%20that%20are%20produced%20based%20on%20the%20cooperation%20and%20contribution%20from%20both%20sides%20can%20enter%20our%20collections.%20For%20more%20information%2C%20contact%20our%20product%20development%20department.%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][tm_spacer item.title: Awards & Accolades
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_section][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer size="sm:95;lg:113"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-8"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][tm_heading custom_google_font="" text="We Win When You Win." font_size="sm:24;md:30;lg:36"][tm_spacer size="lg:27"][tm_heading tag="div" custom_google_font="" text="We have received many awards and accolades from various prestigious associations throughout our long established history. Each of them marks a memorable time of development and growth to us. The objective is to fill up this exhibition with ever-more certifications and awards. Your confidence in our products and services is the motivation for us to move forward and improve ourselves constantly."][tm_spacer size="lg:50"][tm_image image_size="custom" full_wide="1" image="644" image_size_width="770" image_size_height="450" rounded="5"][tm_spacer size="lg:70"][tm_timeline style="02" items="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%224091%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Best%20of%20European%20Business%202006%22%2C%22datetime%22%3A%222018%2F07%2F06%2017%3A55%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22An%20annual%20competition%20by%20Roland%20Berger%20Strategy%20Consultants%20and%20has%20been%20established%20in%202005.%20We%20are%20so%20proud%20to%20be%20the%20best%20business%20in%20the%20EU%20in%202006.%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%224091%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Deming%20Prize%20for%20Quality%202008%22%2C%22datetime%22%3A%222013%2F07%2F08%2010%3A13%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22One%20of%20the%20highest%20global%20awards%20for%20individuals%20%26%20businesses%20that%20have%20successfully%20implemented%20TQM.%20Our%20services%20have%20the%20highest%20quality%20among%20peers%20in%20the%20financing%20industry.%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%224091%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Excellence%20in%20Corporate%20Philanthropy%202010%22%2C%22datetime%22%3A%222013%2F07%2F10%2010%3A13%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22An%20only%20international%20forum%20of%20business%20leaders%20that%20was%20held%20in%20the%20year%20of%202007%20in%20USA.%20Customers%20find%20our%20philanthropy%20useful%2C%20thought-provoking%20and%20sophisticated.%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%224091%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22National%20Quality%20Award%202014%22%2C%22datetime%22%3A%222013%2F07%2F14%2010%3A13%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22The%20only%20formal%20recognition%20of%20the%20excellent%20performance%20of%20both%20public%20and%20private%20U.S.%20organizations.%20Clients%20had%20voted%20for%20us%20to%20be%20the%20only%20company%20whose%20services%20is%20among%20the%20top.%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%224091%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22International%20Investment%20Awards%202016%22%2C%22datetime%22%3A%222013%2F07%2F16%2010%3A13%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Awarded%20by%20the%20national%20investment%20promotion%20agency%20to%20enhance%20the%20nation's%20investment%20appeal.%20Our%20investment%20in%20multiple%20areas%20of%20the%20economy%20prove%20to%20be%20beneficial%20for%20both%20national%20%26%20local%20economy.%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][tm_spacer size="lg:60"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-4"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="page_sidebar"][tm_spacer size="lg:60"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][tm_spacer
